request.description: I want you to test against all subdomains and dir's. Test all access, stuff like sql injection, sending JWT tokens, catching any leaky api's stuff like this.

reasoning.whySubdomainsFirst: Subdomains often reveal hidden attack surface, development environments, and API endpoints that may have weaker security controls
reasoning.testStrategy: Progressive discovery approach - start broad with reconnaissance, narrow down to specific vulnerabilities, then targeted safe exploitation
reasoning.safetyMeasures: Rate limiting, non-destructive testing, scope compliance, proper logging
